title: Sophia Hadjipanteli shoots Bulgari ad campaign
text:
Instagram model Sophia Hadjipanteli looked sensational when she was pictured shooting an ad campaign for Bulgari in Rome on Saturday.

The Cypriot star, 21, showed off her toned tummy in a cream bra top and a matching broderie anglaise midi skirt.

She completed her look with a pair of black heeled boots as she walked down the street.

Natural: Sophia Hadjipanteli looked stylish in a bra top as she shot a Bulgari ad campaign in Rome on Saturday... after the Instagram model was propelled to fame for her unibrow

Sophia showed off her natural beauty on the day, after talking about how her natural bushy unibrow helped propel her to fame.

The University of Maryland marketing graduate grew up in Cyprus before emigrating to the US.

She previously explained that her brow - which she has nicknamed Veronica - is down to her Cypriot genes.

Unique look: She previously explained that her brow - which she has nicknamed Veronica - is down to her Cypriot genes

She added that her ancestors and cultural heritage inspired her to grow her brows out to achieve the hirsute unibrow she's sporting today.

Speaking to Good Morning Britain, she said: 'I’ve always been known to change my look and do whatever I really wanted.

'And I guess that sort of stubbornness and rebelliousness has made me do literally whatever I want.'

And she's not fazed in the slightest about people's reactions to her unique but beautiful look.

She said: 'I think for me it’s about being able to walk outside on a busy street in London with something that I know people will have negative, shocking, positive, cringeworthy, uncomfortable reactions to, and still be able to be strong with who I am, and just walk down the street.'

'At the end of the day I left my house loving the way I looked and try to be true to who I am.'
description: Instagram model Sophia Hadjipanteli looked sensational when she was pictured shooting an ad campaign for Bulgari in Rome on Saturday.
